sections.content:
Question:
Is the RX26T compatible with existing products?
Answer:
The RX26T is highly compatible with existing RX-T series products.
The RX26T uses the 5V power supply that has high demand in motor applications. This enables reuse and utilization of conventional 5V power supply system components. This product has enhanced functionality and improved usability compared to existing products, such as the RX24T, while maintaining a high degree of compatibility for built-in functions such as inverter control timers and pin layout orientation.
Differences between each product are summarized in the application notes below, which include a comparison of built-in functions, an overview of specifications, terminal functionality, and considerations for migration.
Differences between RX26T and RX66T groups 
Differences between RX26T and RX24T/RX24U groups
Differences between RX26T and RX62T groups
Differences between RX26T and RX63T groups
Differences between RX26T and RX23T groups
Other related information: Tips on Replacing MCUs of Other Families with RX MCUs
  Suitable Products
